attributes.action: Call a general election if he resigns before next due date of a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the prime minister said "that he would serve a  full term". he also said that he would retire "some time this year". The only way the two statements are compatible is if we have a general election. If you support this petition please sign

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
